section.title: Overview
section.para: This module provides basic HTTP/1.0 server functionality inside SIP Router. SIP and HTTP are very similar protocols, so, practically, the SIP parser can easily handle HTTP requests just by adding a fake Via header.

The xmlrpc module uses the same concept. xHTTP module offers a generic HTTP handling way, by calling event_route[xhttp:request] in your config. You can check the HTTP URL via config variable $hu. Note that use of $ru will raise errors since the structure of an HTTP URL is not compatible with that of a SIP URI.

section.title: url_skip (str)
section.para: Regular expression to match the HTTP URL. If there is a match, then event route is not executed.

section.title: url_match (str)
section.para: Regular expression to match the HTTP URL. If there is no match, then event route is not executed. This check is done after url_skip, so if both url_skip and url_match would match then the event route is not executed (url_skip has higher priority).
